choices.name: Fighter
choices.description: A skilled warrior proficient with various weapons and armor.

choices.name: Great Weapon Fighting
choices.description: Focuses on using large, two-handed weapons to deal heavy damage.

choices.name: Sword and Shield
choices.description: Combines offense and defense by using a sword and shield.

choices.name: Rogue
choices.description: A sneaky and agile character, skilled in deception and stealth.

choices.name: Thief
choices.description: A master of stealth and thievery.

choices.name: Assassin
choices.description: Skilled in eliminating targets with precision and speed.

choices.name: Cleric
choices.description: A holy spellcaster who draws power from divine sources.

choices.name: Life
choices.description: Focuses on healing and protecting others.

choices.name: War
choices.description: Adept at both spellcasting and combat.

choices.name: Ranger
choices.description: A skilled hunter and tracker, often accompanied by an animal companion.

choices.name: Beast Master
choices.description: Commands an animal companion to fight by their side.

choices.name: Hunter
choices.description: Specializes in tracking and taking down dangerous foes.
